c:["$","p","12",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"这首诗作于天宝三载（744年），李白离开长安时。李白在朝廷中受到排挤，被\"赐金放还\"，在朋友为他饯行的宴会上，写下了这首诗。"}]
d:["$","hr","13",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
e:["$","$L6","14",{"delay":0.7000000000000001,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"译文"}]}]
f:["$","p","15",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"金杯中的美酒一斗价十千，玉盘里的菜肴珍贵值万钱。"}]
10:["$","p","16",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"心中愁闷，我放下杯筷不愿进餐，拔出宝剑环顾四周，心里一片茫然。"}]
11:["$","p","17",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"想渡黄河，冰雪却冻封了河川；要登太行，莽莽风雪早已封山。"}]
12:["$","p","18",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"像吕尚垂钓溪上，闲待东山再起；又像伊尹做梦，他乘船经过日边。"}]
13:["$","p","19",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"人生道路多么艰难，多么艰难；歧路纷杂，如今又身在何处？"}]
14:["$","p","20",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"相信乘风破浪的时机总会到来，到时定要扬起征帆，横渡沧海！"}]
15:["$","hr","21",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
16:["$","$L6","22",{"delay":1.1,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"赏析"}]}]
17:["$","p","23",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"这首诗一共十四句，八十二个字，在七言歌行中只能算是短篇，但它跳荡纵横，具有长篇的气势格局。其重要的原因之一，就在于它百步九折地揭示了诗人感情的激荡起伏、复杂变化。"}]
18:["$","p","24",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"诗的一开头，\"金樽清酒\"，\"玉盘珍羞\"，让人感觉似乎是一个欢乐的宴会，但紧接着\"停杯投箸\"、\"拔剑四顾\"两个细节，就显示了感情波涛的强烈冲击。中间四句，刚刚慨叹\"冰塞川\"、\"雪满山\"，又恍然神游千载之上，仿佛看到了吕尚、伊尹由微贱而忽然得到君主重用。诗人心理上的失望与希望、抑郁与追求，急遽变化交替。"}]
19:["$","p","25",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"\"行路难，行路难，多歧路，今安在？\"四句节奏短促、跳跃，完全是急切不安状态下的内心独白，逼肖地传达出进退失据而又要继续探索追求的复杂心理。"}]
1a:["$","p","26",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"结尾二句，经过前面的反复回旋以后，境界顿开，唱出了高昂乐观的调子，相信自己的理想抱负总有实现的一天。"}]
1b:["$","p","27",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"通过这样层层迭迭的感情起伏变化，既充分显示了黑暗污浊的政治现实对诗人的宏大理想抱负的阻遏，反映了由此而引起的诗人内心的强烈苦闷、愤郁和不平，同时又突出表现了诗人的倔强、自信和他对理想的执着追求，展示了诗人力图从苦闷中挣脱出来的强大精神力量。"}]
1c:["$","hr","28",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
1d:["$","$L6","29",{"delay":1.4500000000000002,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"千古名句"}]}]
1e:["$","p","30",{"className":"font-semibold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-200 my-6 text-xl","children":"\"长风破浪会有时，直挂云帆济沧海\""}]
1f:["$","p","31",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"这句诗表达了诗人对未来的坚定信念和乐观精神，成为千古传诵的名句。它告诉我们：即使前路艰难，只要坚持理想，终会有成功的一天。"}]
20:["$","hr","32",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
21:["$","div","33",{"className":"mt-10 pt-6 border-t border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800","children":[["$","h4",null,{"className":"text-sm font-medium text-stone-500 dark:text-stone-400 mb-3","children":"标签"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"flex flex-wrap gap-2","children":[["$","span","0",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"理想"}],["$","span","1",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"挫折"}],["$","span","2",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"自信"}],["$","span","3",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"励志"}],["$","span","4",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"唐代"}]]}]]}]
